description:
InfraHire is looking for a Paralegal in Los Angeles, CA

Seeking Full-time Paralegal (2+ Years Of Experience) To Provide Support To Civil Litigation And Family Law Departments. Tasks Will Include, But Are Not Limited To

  • Document management: File intake, organization, redaction, bates-numbering, and production
  • Drafting and preparation of hearing notebooks, discovery shells, pleadings, declarations, Judicial Council forms, and correspondence
  • E-filing/E-service in Superior Court, District Court, and Appellate Court
  • Prior family law experience is a plus
  • Certified Public Notary is a plus

Benefits: 10 days paid vacation, 5 days paid sick leave, fully paid medical/dental benefits, 401(k)/Profit Sharing Plan

InfraHire is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
benefits: 10 days paid vacation, 5 days paid sick leave, fully paid medical/dental benefits, 401(k)/Profit Sharing Plan
